# [Request to Collaborate](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf6yBxC_A4G2luIqD5hABHwIurH9Tu19ooL4-nnIOQvU7XtuQ/viewform?usp=sf_link)

We welcome collaborations with external researchers.  If you are interested in forming a collaboration with one or more of the VEDB PIs, please read our **[Collaboration terms and Conditions](https://docs.google.com/document/d/17fI4j78OYshcBxxvp2Wq5LgLeruCDTBwfFIQkOC0Qsc/edit?usp=sharing)** and then complete the **[Request to Collaborate](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf6yBxC_A4G2luIqD5hABHwIurH9Tu19ooL4-nnIOQvU7XtuQ/viewform?usp=sf_link)** form.

# [Request early access to data](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdk66Lk9jg6egBP44Nl2tK5UrzobiF5hJxvzFb_wVCDybZwRw/viewform?usp=sf_link)  
<div class = "grid">
<div class = "grid-img">
<img src="earlyaccess.png" alt="picture of old-fashioned round alarm clock set to 1:51"> 
</div>

<div class = "grid-text">
Data is embargoed for 6 months from time of collection to ensure adequate processing and initial analysis by the Project Team.  Occasionally, access to data by external researchers will be granted provided the research questions to be addressed do not overlap substantially with those of the project PIs and their teams.  To **[Request Early Access to the data](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdk66Lk9jg6egBP44Nl2tK5UrzobiF5hJxvzFb_wVCDybZwRw/viewform?usp=sf_link)**, complete and submit the linked form.  
</div>
</div>
